description.value: When preparing a Grenade, Missile or Round with the Explosive or Smoke Quality, they can make a +0 Tech-Use Test using the Demolitions Special Use. If they succeed they increase the Damage (if it would do damage) and Blast Radius by 1, +1 per Three Degrees of Success beyond the first. If test is failed by more Degrees of Failiure than their Intelligence Bonus, they accidentally trigger the device and it detonates immediately.
